1.title: Cybernator, Panther Squad, and Project Metalbeast
1.plot: Special guest star Freddie Williams takes on three terrible movies with Mike, Jay, and Rich Evans. What will happen on the brand new Best of the Worst set?!?!? Probably the same thing that usually happens. Mike drinks too much and bullies people and says outrageous things. Jay also reveals he don't know what a turret is.

1.title: Russian Terminator, Ninja Vengeance, and Never Too Young to Die
1.plot: The first episode of Red Letter Media's newest and most successful series since Gamestation 2.0! Watch the comedy and horror as the RLM crew watch and analyze bad movies! This episode features Russian Terminator, Ninja Vengeance, and Never Too Young To Die!

2.title: The New Gladiators, Exterminator 2, and Aftermath
2.plot: In this sci-fi dystopian schlock episode, Jay, Josh, Jack, and Richard William Thomas Evans III watch three films: The New Gladiators, Exterminator 2, and The Aftermath. Which film will be crowned the Best of the Worst?

3.title: The Killer Eye, They Bite, and Xtro
3.plot: The gang examine and discuss three bewb-filled alien creature features, and accidentally watch a good film in the process.

4.title: Deadly Prey, Hard Ticket to Hawaii, and Miami Connection
4.plot: Jay, Rich, Jack and Josh brave through 3 surprisingly entertaining action movies set in a warm climate.

5.title: The Wheel of the Worst
5.plot: Redlettermedia introduce a new device of torture on The Best of the Worst - The Wheel of the Worst. Watch as Mike, Jay, Jessi, and Rich Evans spin the wheel of the worst to randomly select terrible videos to watch and discuss.

6.title: The Vindicator, Cyber Tracker, Robot Jox, and R.O.T.O.R.
6.plot: After numerous failed attempts with forgettable movies, the gang finally settles in for a robot double feature of Robot Jox and R.O.T.O.R. This episode was shot on a dark and stormy night, and much alcohol was consumed in order to properly come to terms with the madness that is R.O.T.O.R.

7.title: Playing Dangerous, Shapeshifter, and Thunderpants
7.plot: This week on Best of the Worst, the gang tackles misguided children's films. Or what they THOUGHT were children's films anyway.

8.title: Wheel of the Worst #2
8.plot: OMFG! It's Best of the Worst Episode 8. Watch as Jack, Wizard, Rich, and Mike tackle 3 selections off of the Wheel of the Worst! It's horrifying!

9.title: V-World Matrix, the Amazing Bulk, and????
9.plot: With professional visual effects artist Colin in tow, the gang watches two visual effects-driven turds as well as a mystery movie.

10.title: Bloody Birthday, Crazy Fat Ethel II, and Psycho from Texas
10.plot: With the help of special guest Gillian, the gang suffers through some of the worst movies on Best of the Worst yet: the worst lil' murderers slasher film Bloody Birthday, Grandma's-home-movie-disguised-as-a-sequel Crazy Fat Ethel II, and the Coen Brother's-esque crime caper Psycho From Texas.

11.title: Night Beast, Trick or Treat, and Skull Forest
11.plot: Happy Halloween. The gang gets dressed up in their finest Halloween attire and watches three horror-filled turds.

12.title: Wheel of the Worst #3
12.plot:

13.title: Playing Dangerous 2, the Exterminator, and the Deadliest Prey
13.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Elves, Santa Claus, and Christmas Vacation 2
14.plot: Merry Christmas, everyone! Santa's left the Best of the Worst crew a grouping of films that are the cinematic equivalent to a lump of coal.

1.title: Robo-C.H.I.C., Alien Seed, and Yor: The Hunter from the Future
1.plot: The gang watches three 80's sci-fi movies and discover, to their horror, that one is a comedy video. Jay commits suicide live in the video. Rich Evans dies of a heart attack. Mike survives the viewing with mild PTSD and a hangover and Josh learns the magic of Christmas.

2.title: Wheel of the Worst #4
2.plot:

3.title: Supergirl, Captain America
3.plot: Jay, Jack, Josh and Richard Evans try to sit through three awful superhero films. To their surprise; one of them turns out to be halfway decent.

9.title: Wheel of the Worst #6
9.plot: The gang take a look at 'How Can I Tell if I'm Really in Love?', 'The Osteoporosis Dance' and 'American Flatulators'. Which video is best of the worst?

10.title: Theodore Rex, Carnosaur, Tammy and the T-Rex

1.title: Alienator, Alien from the Deep, and Hands of Steel
1.plot: Rich Evans and three others watch 3 terrible Sci-Fi films!

2.title: Blood Debts, the Tomb, and Undefeatable
2.plot: Mike, Jack, Wizard and Rich Evans watch 3 terrible action movies! What horrors await them!?

3.title: Wheel of the Worst #8
3.plot: Jack, Jay, Mike and Rich Evans all take a spin on the wheel of nightmares and horror.

4.title: Lady Terminator, Lost in Dinosaur World, and Low Blow
4.plot: Colin from Canada joins the gang to watch a terminator movie, a film about a theme park filled with dinosaurs, and a movie where an old man punches people.

5.title: Wheel of the Worst #9
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Future War, the Jar, and White Fire
6.plot: Oh no. It's a Battle of the Genres episode of Best of the Worst. This episode features both one of the best movies the group has ever watched on the show, as well as one of the worst. Also, Robert Z'dar wears his best Borg cosplay.

7.title: Kiss Meets the Phantom of the Park, Killer Workout and Mystics in Bali
7.plot: Boooooo. Happy Halloween. For this Best of the Worst Halloween Spooktacular, the gang watches three totally scary movies that cause Jay to pass out, Rich to piss himself and Mike to fall asleep: Kiss Meets the Phantom of the Park, David A. Prior's Killer Workout, and Mystics in Bali, which is so scary that the gang can't remember the title.

8.title: The Photon Effect, How I Saved the President, and Double Down
8.plot: The gang (and special guest Max Landis) watch 3-off genre films: a superhero film, a 90's children's film, and something that defies any genre. Will they survive Max Landis? I mean the movies!?

9.title: A Very Cannon Christmas
9.plot: It's the holiday season, yet again. Join the Red Letter Media gang as they celebrate by opening presents that contain either Christmas specials or violent 80s action movies made by the good people at Cannon Films.

1.title: Wheel of the Worst #10
1.plot: Mike, Jay, Jack and Rich Evans spin the wheel and get three terrible films.

2.title: Order of the Black Eagle, Wired to Kill, and Raiders of Atlantis
2.plot: The gang watches three horrible, explosive action movies that all feature someone getting set on fire. Other highlights include baboons driving tanks, the lost city of Atlantis having an unseen motorcycle manufacturing plant, and a woman being mentally abused for the entire run time of a "fun" action thriller.

3.title: Plinketto #1
3.plot: The gang tries out a new random movie selection device, to disastrous results. What movies are selected? Watch and see, but here's a hint: they're all the worst possible selections.

4.title: Wheel of the Worst #11
4.plot: To recover from the last miserable episode of Best of the Worst, the group decided to utilize the Wheel of the Worst. Because the group are gluttons for punishment.

5.title: Pocket Ninjas, Cyclone, and Dangerous Men
5.plot: Put on your sweatpants and prepare a pot of coffee because this is gonna be a long night. The gang watches two of the most baffling, nonsensical movies they've ever watched with Pocket Ninjas and Dangerous Men. Cyclone's in there too.

6.title: Wheel of the Worst #12
6.plot: The Canadians are back. And what better way to welcome them to the US than by subjecting them to painful, outdated VHS tapes?

7.title: Plinketto #2
7.plot: The Plinketto board is back. Is the Plinketto board replacing Half in the Bag? Is Half in the bag replacing Best of the Worst? Is the comment section replacing Red Letter Media? Are tired memes replacing even more tired memes?

8.title: Parole Violators, Future Force and Geteven
8.plot: Jay, Mike and Rich Evans encounter aliens from another country who visit Milwaukee for a short while to drink booze and watch terrible movies only to return to their home country, changed, less human, and more afraid of cinema than they ever have been before.

9.title: Scary or Die, Chopping Mall, the Exorcist II: The Heretic
9.plot: Boooo. It's the 2016 Best of the Worst Halloween Spooktacular, featuring clown monsters, evil killer robots, and James Earl Jones wearing a giant bug costume.

10.title: Wheel of the Worst #13
10.plot: Mike, Jay, Jack, Josh and Rich Evans try their luck on the Wheel of the Worst but fail on an epic level. They must watch ever tape.. Or at least PART of every tape.

11.title: RepliGATOR, Johnson Family Christmas Dinner, and Alligator
11.plot: Happy Holidays. To celebrate the Christmas season, the gang watches one terrible Christmas film and two films about alligators.

1.title: Plinketto #3
1.plot: The Plinketto Board is back to terrorize the BOTW gang. It's possible with the selections at hand, the ball landed on the worst films possible. Is it fate? Is it the universe telling these losers to get a life? We'll let YOU decide.

2.title: Carnosaur 2, the Skateboard Kid 2, and Future Zone
2.plot: The gang watches sequels to previous Best of the Worst Movies. This is the second time they've done this, making it a sequel episode.

3.title: Biohazard, Slaughter High, and Kill Point
3.plot: Mike, Jay and Rich welcome special guest Freddie Williams to the first ever episode of Best of the Worst Selection Series, in which Freddie personally selects all three films for the group to watch.

4.title: Wheel of the Worst #14
4.plot: You thought it was dead. You thought wrong. The gang revives the Wheel of the Worst to torture us all!

5.title: Bigfoot vs D.B. Cooper, Black Cougar, and Raw Force
5.plot: Special guest star Len Kabasinski is back on Best of the Worst! This time Mike, Jay, Rich Evans, Jack and Len watch three terrible films.

6.title: Hollywood Cop
6.plot: In the first "Spotlight Series" episode of Best of the Worst, the gang takes a look at Hollywood Cop! From the director of Samurai Cop!

7.title: Wheel of the Worst #15
7.plot: The Canadians are back! And we've decided to torture them yet again with the dreaded Wheel of the Woooooooorst!!!!

8.title: The Sweeper, Empire of the Dark, and Mad Foxes
8.plot: Oh no, it's Best of the Worst! This time the group watches three films that were recommended to us by one of our Canadian friends. It's The Sweeper, Empire of the Dark and a German release of a Spanish movie, Mad Foxes.

9.title: The Last Vampire on Earth
9.plot: Mike, Jay and Rich Evans are joined by Colin from Canada to discuss the unsung bad movie masterpiece The Last Vampire on Earth, which is in no way "inspired" by Twilight.

10.title: Plinketto #4
10.plot: The gang is back to drop the ball on Plinketto.

11.title: Vampire Assassin, Hack-O-Lantern, and Cathy's Curse
11.plot: It's that time of year again for another Best of the Worst Halloween Spooktacular. This year, the gang watches the totally-not-a-Blade-ripoff Vampire Assassin, The Halloween-themed slasher film Hack-O-Lantern, and the totally-not-an-Exorcist-or-Omen-ripoff Cathy's Curse.

12.title: Suburban Sasquatch
12.plot: Mike, Jay, and Rich watch and dissect "Suburban Sasquatch," one of their favorite bad movies, with Jack, who's only just seen it for the first time.

13.title: Wheel of the Worst #16
13.plot: The RLM crew discovers the crowning masterpiece of 80's instructional videos.

14.title: Merry Kick-mas!
14.plot: Ho Ho Ho. The group celebrates Kick-mas by watching some terrible action movies with people kicking on the cover and a terrible animated Christmas special where nobody kicks or does much of anything.

1.title: Plinketto #5
1.plot: The crew watches three extra terrible tapes, including the sequel to a tape they've seen before.

2.title: The Black Spine Edition
2.plot: Oh no. Mike has found a new way to torture Jay, Jack, and Rich Evans in this terrifying new episode of Best of the Worst. For years unmarked tapes have sat on the shelf. No one knew what they were. - until now. Enjoy this frightening new episode with a special surprise.

3.title: Hologram Man, Faust, and Blood Street
3.plot: The gang watches a Demolition Man/Lawnmower Man ripoff, a Spawn ripoff that turns out to not be a Spawn ripoff, and a Leo Fong movie.

4.title: Plinketto #6
4.plot: A special Guest joins the gang as they drop the Plinketto ball for the 6th time. What horrors await them?

5.title: Kill Squad, Ryan's Babe, and Demonwarp
5.plot: The gang watches another Cameron Mitchell movie that Cameron Mitchell's barely in but lots of people get kicked, a Canadian-made road trip """"comedy"""" thriller (?), and an alien bigfoot movie. Lives are changed.

6.title: Wheel of the Worst #17
6.plot: The Canadians are back. TO SPIN THE WHEEL OF THE WORST. Watch them watch videos that represent the worst of humanity.

7.title: Night of the Lepus, Zombie 3, and Silk
7.plot: Take a trip down memory lane as Best of the Worst celebrates the 35th anniversary of the release of the first camcorder by filming an entire episode on VHS cameras. You'll laugh. You'll cry. You'll be nauseous from the horribly blown out low grade imagery. The only reprieve would be the fact that all three movies watched are 2K and 4K restorations available on blu-ray, but the movies themselves are just terrible so it doesn't matter.

8.title: Lycan Colony
8.plot: It's another Spotlight Episode of Best of the Worst. This time, the gang watches Lycan Colony. A movie about a town full of """""werewolves.""""" AWESOME.

9.title: Carnivore, HauntedWeen, and Black Roses
9.plot: Booooo. It's Halloween again, which means the group has gotten together to watch some spooky horror films, including the now-traditional Heavy Metal-themed monster movie. Things got crazy. Then they didn't.

10.title: Black Spine Edition #2
10.plot: Oh no. The group tortures themselves with yet another Black Spine Edition(TM). What horrors await?

11.title: Plinketto #7
11.plot: The gang is back. This time they are "dropping the ball" on the Plinketto board again. What three moopies will they watch this time? Nothing special about this episode.

12.title: Christmas or Cats
12.plot: Merry Cat-mas, friends. To celebrate the holiday, the group watches movies that may be either terrible Christmas films or terrible films about cats. Or maybe both. Ho Ho Ho.

imdb.title: Best of the Worst
plot: Mike, Jay, Rich and the rest of the Red Letter Media crew brave some of the worst movies ever created by man.::Jonathan Nelson
